rules_text:
When UWB02 Immortal's Lament enters, surveil 2.
{CW}{CB}, Exile a card from your graveyard: UWB02 Immortal's Lament becomes a copy of that card until end of turn, except its an enchantment in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: [i]There are some songs even the spirits of Ol-gal no longer sing... I miss them.[/i]
